ValidationRule.description: Alerts users and prevents saving when "Current DIR Emnployee" and "New to DIR" checkboxes are not checked or both are checked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISNULL(End_Date__c))&& ((New_To_DIR__c = true && Current_DIR_Employee__c = true) || (New_To_DIR__c = false && Current_DIR_Employee__c = false))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Select "New to DIR" or "Current DIR Employee"
